Class ServerLogic

java.lang.Object
ServerLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ServerLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Server logic class, or better known as our threading class.

    Server that is passed into the thread

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerLogic

      public ServerLogic​(java.net.Socket connection, BlackJackServer server, int counter)
      Constructor for thread
      Parameters:
      connection - connection for the thread to client
      server - the main server that client is running on
      counter - id of the thread

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      The thread run method. assigns the streams and then waits to draw cards for the client. Once client dissconnects we terminate the connection
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • processConnection

      private void processConnection() throws java.io.IOException
      draw cards method.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - in case the drawing cards methodhas IOException

    • sendDeck

      private void sendDeck​(Deck playerDeck)
      Send the card that was drawn back to the client
      Parameters:
      playerDeck - the deck of the client

    • getStreams

      private void getStreams() throws java.io.IOException
      Assign the streams to our instance variables
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - any issues assigning the steams will throw this exception

    • closeConnection

      private void closeConnection()
      Method to close the connection with the thread and client.
